tool_description: Parses and standardizes learning objectives from natural language descriptions into structured, measurable goals aligned with educational taxonomies.

objective_text.description: Natural language description of learning objectives or goals

taxonomy_framework.description: Educational taxonomy to use for classification (blooms, solo, 4cs)

skill_level.description: Target skill level (novice, intermediate, advanced, expert)

error_messages: Empty objective text: Provide a meaningful description of learning objectives.
Unsupported taxonomy: Use one of the supported frameworks (blooms, solo, 4cs).
Invalid skill level: Use one of (novice, intermediate, advanced, expert).
Parsing failed: Unable to extract meaningful objectives from the provided text.
usage: Provide objective_text describing what learners should achieve; optionally specify taxonomy_framework, subject_domain, and skill_level for more precise parsing. Returns structured learning objectives.

parsed_objectives.description: List of individual parsed learning objectives

cognitive_levels.description: Cognitive complexity levels for each objective

key_concepts.description: Key concepts and skills identified in objectives

measurability_score.description: Score indicating how measurable the objectives are (0-1)
